name: Far From Home (T3kMast3r)
description:
You play as a boy trying to stay warm and cozy in his home. You must gather resources to keep the fire going and stay warm. If you don't, you will freeze to death and not make it home. 

Controls:
   Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
   Interact (Wood & Fireplace): E or Q
   Switch Inventory Slots: 12345

Game Art: https://opengameart.org/
Game Audio/Music: https://freesound.org/
